trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jeannette
There were no other sightings in Jeannette on or around April 28th 0001
divs: Sighting DetailsIn Southwestern PA observed two objects high in the sky. One of the objects came to a stop and the other came up to the stopped object and stopped as well. Then the both accelerated with tremendous speed and went in opposite directions and were gone from sight in seconds.
Summary: In Southwestern PA observed two objects high in the sky. Then the both accelerated with tremendous speed and went in opposite directions and were gone from sight in seconds
